1: <pb/>Re' i QaJaaw Dios je' wili i xuq'or weh:
2: <pb/><t>Hat rak'uun winaq 多Mi chihooj re' i ruche'el i uuva</t> <t>chuwach i chee' wilkeeb' pantaq ch'ahn?</t>
3: <t>多Mi neerub'an re' chi neensik'arik i q'ab' uuva reh chi</t> <t>neen korjik i chib'ih jariik chi reh?</t> <t>oon 多Chi t'uyaab' jino'q xa chib'ih jariik?</t>
4: <t>Xa sii' la' chik neenkahnik</t> <t>wii' noq k'ahtinaq chik taqe i ju', je' wo' taqe i panyejaal.</t> <t>多Mi ko wilik neen kamanik wii' re'?</t>
5: <t>Wila' ma' chih xkamanik wii'</t> <t>noq komanlik wach ruche'el,</t> <t>kora'j naa chik wilik neen kamanik wii' re' noq k'ahtinaq chik.</t>
6: <pb/>Ruum aj re', re' hin i Dios i nuq'or chi je' wili: <pb/><t>Nik' wach noq ink'atarik pan q'aaq' i ruche'el i uuva.</t> <t>Je' wo' re' noq naa nukutum taqe pan q'aaq'</t> <t>i aj Jerusaleem i hin chi k'atb'al keh.</t>
7: <t>Re' hin naa nuye'em nujosq'iil chikinaah.</t> <t>Atoob' ta neenkiko'leej kiib' chuwach i q'aaq' pampeet,</t> <t>xa q'aaq' wo' i naa ruk'atwiik keh.</t> <t>Eh re' taq i hat naa taq anab'eem chi re' hin i k'achlik Dios.</t>
8: <t>Re' hin naa nukanaam i Jerusaleem chi xan tz'irik chik paam</t> <t>ruum xa re' i yiib' wach na'ojb'al inki a'n</t> <t>inki i QaJaaw Dios.</t>
